feature.automatic.aimode.description: Manages AI control for the client player.
feature.fighting.killaura.description: Sets the maximum attack distance for entities.
feature.fighting.reach.description: Extends interaction distance with blocks and entities.
feature.fighting.noattack.description: List of entities not to attack.
feature.fighting.playermanager.descripti: Manages lists of friends and enemies.
feature.fighting.superattack.description: Selects the method for critical attacks.
feature.fighting.impactattack.descriptio: Automatically attacks the target you are looking at when the attack key is pressed.
feature.fighting.armormanager.descriptio: Automatically equips the best armor and manages elytra.
feature.fighting.autototem.description: Automatically equips a totem when health is low.
feature.fighting.lockon.description: Locks onto a target and assists with aiming.
feature.movement.autotool.description: Automatically switches to the best tool for mining.
feature.movement.supersprint.description: Forces sprinting even when hungry or moving backward.
feature.movement.safewalk.description: Prevents falling off edges by sneaking.
feature.movement.freeze.description: Stops sending movement packets to the server, allowing for teleportation.
feature.movement.featherwalk.description: Prevents jumping and sprinting on certain blocks.
feature.rendering.supersight.description: Maximizes game brightness and disables blindness effects.
feature.rendering.xray.description: Allows seeing through blocks to find ores and hidden structures.
feature.rendering.cameraconfig.descripti: Configures camera distance, clipping, and anti-hurt tilt.
feature.rendering.freecamera.description: Allows free movement of the camera independently of the player.
feature.rendering.radar.description: Displays nearby entities on a radar.
feature.rendering.detailinfo.description: Displays detailed information about the targeted block or entity.
feature.rendering.hypertag.description: Displays health bars and names above entities.
feature.rendering.portalgui.description: Displays a GUI when in a portal.
feature.rendering.search.blocksearch.des: Highlights specified blocks in the world.
feature.server.serverinfo.description: Displays detailed information about the current server.
feature.server.detectserver.description: Adjusts feature levels based on server detection.
feature.automatic.aimode.allowplayerinpu: Allows player input even in AI mode.
feature.automatic.aimode.cancelondamaged: Forces AI to stop when the player takes damage.
feature.fighting.aimassist.fov.descripti: Field of View to limit targeting (degrees).
feature.fighting.autototem.hp.descriptio: HP at which totem is equipped.
feature.fighting.gunner.changemode.descr: How to toggle reload and shot
feature.fighting.impactattack.range.desc: Sets the maximum attack range for automatic attacks.
feature.fighting.impactattack.cps.descri: Sets the clicks per second for automatic attacks.
feature.fighting.killaura.range.descript: Sets the maximum attack distance for entities.
feature.fighting.killaura.maxtargets.des: Maximum number of entities to attack simultaneously (0 for unlimited).
feature.fighting.killaura.attackfrequenc: Sets the attack frequency (0 for automatic adjustment).
feature.fighting.killaura.changeangle.de: Turns towards the entity when attacking.
feature.fighting.lockon.fov.description: Field of View to limit targeting (degrees).
feature.fighting.noattack.protectedentit: List of entities not to attack.
feature.fighting.playermanager.friends.d: List of players to treat as friends.
feature.fighting.playermanager.enemies.d: List of players to treat as enemies.
feature.fighting.superattack.method.desc: Selects the method for critical attacks.
feature.movement.featherwalk.allowedbloc: List of block IDs to suppress jumping and sprinting on.
feature.movement.freeze.duration.descrip: Maximum duration (seconds) before freeze automatically disables. 0 for unlimited.
feature.movement.freeze.packetlimit.desc: Maximum number of packets to accumulate before freeze automatically restarts. 0 for unlimited.
feature.movement.supersprint.onlywhenfor: Enables sprinting only when moving forward.
feature.movement.supersprint.evenifhungr: Forces sprinting even when hunger is low.
feature.rendering.cameraconfig.cameradis: Sets the distance between the camera and the player.
feature.rendering.cameraconfig.clipblock: Sets whether the camera penetrates terrain.
feature.rendering.cameraconfig.antihurtt: Camera no longer shakes when taking damage.
feature.rendering.cameraconfig.extracame: Camera no longer depends on player's orientation.
feature.rendering.detailinfo.width.descr: Sets the width of the widget.
feature.rendering.radar.margin.descripti: Radar UI margin (% of screen short side).
feature.rendering.radar.size.description: Radar UI size (% of screen short side).
List of blocks to display with XRay when exposed.
feature.server.detectserver.featurelevel: Adjusts feature levels based on server detection.
command.infinite.config.reset.category: All settings in category '%s' have been reset.
command.infinite.config.reset.feature: All settings in feature '%s' have been reset.
command.infinite.config.reset.setting: Setting '%s' of feature '%s' has been reset.
command.infinite.setting.type.boolean: Not a Boolean type. (Use true or false).
command.infinite.setting.list.notlist: Setting '%s' is not a list type. add/del commands can only be used for list type settings.
feature.movement.superfly.keepfly.descri: Keep Flying even if force cancelled.
